Ability.Name: Holy:Power Word: Shield (Low HP)
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") <= 65 and UnitDebuffID(PQR_CustomTarget,6788) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Shadow:Vampiric Touch
Ability.Lua:
local VT, _, _, _, _, _, timer = UnitDebuffID("target", 48160, "PLAYER")
if IsSpellInRange("Vampiric Touch", "target") ~= 1 or PQR_IsCastingSpell(48160) ~= false then return false else if VT ~= nil then if timer - GetTime() <= 2.1 then return true end else return true end end

Ability.Name: Shadow:Shadowfiend
Ability.Lua: if UnitLevel("target") == -1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Shadow:Shadowform

Ability.Name: Shadow:Shadow Word: Pain

local sw={UnitBuff("player", "Shadow Weaving")} local SWP, _, _, _, _, _, timer = UnitDebuffID("target", 48125, "PLAYER")
if IsSpellInRange("Shadow Word: Pain", "target") ~= 1 then return false else if SWP ~= nil then if timer - GetTime() <= 4.3 then return true end else return true end end

Ability.Name: Shadow:Mind Flay
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange("Mind Flay", "target") == 1 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(48156) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: Shadow:Mind Sear

Ability.Name: Shadow:Shadow Word: Death
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") <= 35 and IsSpellInRange("Mind Blast", "target") == 1 then return true end

Ability.Name: Dis:Target Low HP
Ability.Lua:
if UnitExists("target") and UnitIsDead("target") == nil and UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and UnitCanCooperate("player","target") and UnitInRange("target") ~= nil then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") else
PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() lowhpmembers = 0 needfortitude = 0 needshadow = 0 needspirit = 0 needshield = 0
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = 100 * UnitHealth(member) / UnitHealthMax(member) local haveshield = nil if UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsFriend("player", member) and UnitHasVehicleUI(member) == false and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil then if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" then memberhp = memberhp - 1 end if UnitThreatSituation(member) == 3 then memberhp = memberhp - 3 end if UnitBuffID(member, 53563) ~= nil then memberhp = memberhp + 7 end if UnitBuffID(member, 48162) == nil and UnitBuffID(member, 48161) == nil then needfortitude = needfortitude + 1 end if UnitBuffID(member, 48170) == nil and UnitBuffID(member, 48169) == nil then needshadow = needshadow + 1 end if UnitBuffID(member, 48074) == nil and UnitBuffID(member, 48073) == nil then needspirit = needspirit + 1 end if UnitDebuffID(member, 6788) == nil then needshield = needshield + 1 end if UnitDebuffID(member, 6788) then haveshield = true end if memberhp < 85 then lowhpmembers = lowhpmembers +1 end if memberhp < PQR_CustomTargetHP then PQR_CustomTarget = member PQR_CustomTargetHP = memberhp end end end
end

Ability.Name: -- Start Fight --
Ability.Lua: if StopRota or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") or IsMounted() or UnitChannelInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitCastingInfo("player") ~= nil or UnitBuff("player", "Drink") or UnitBuff("player", "Food") then return true end

Ability.Name: -- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if StopRota then
StopRota = false print("Rotation reenabled!")
else
StopRota = true print("Rotation stopped!")
end end
if not rightkeydown then rightkeydown = 0 end
if IsRightControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - rightkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if DoNotDispell then
DoNotDispell = false print("Dispell enabled!")
else
DoNotDispell = true print("Dispell disabled!")
end end

Ability.Name: Holy:Target Low HP
Ability.Lua:
if UnitExists("target") and UnitIsDead("target") == nil and UnitIsFriend("player", "target") and UnitCanCooperate("player","target") and UnitInRange("target") ~= nil then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") else
PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() lowhpmembers = 0 needfortitude = 0 needshadow = 0 needspirit = 0
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = 100 * UnitHealth(member) / UnitHealthMax(member) if UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsFriend("player", member) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil then if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" then memberhp = memberhp - 1 end if UnitThreatSituation(member) == 3 then memberhp = memberhp - 3 end if UnitBuffID(member, 53563) ~= nil then memberhp = memberhp + 7 end if UnitBuffID(member, 48162) == nil and UnitBuffID(member, 48161) == nil then needfortitude = needfortitude + 1 end if UnitBuffID(member, 48170) == nil and UnitBuffID(member, 48169) == nil then needshadow = needshadow + 1 end if UnitBuffID(member, 48074) == nil and UnitBuffID(member, 48073) == nil then needspirit = needspirit + 1 end if memberhp < 85 then lowhpmembers = lowhpmembers +1 end if memberhp < PQR_CustomTargetHP then PQR_CustomTarget = member PQR_CustomTargetHP = memberhp end end end
end

Ability.Name: Holy:Mass Dispel
Ability.Lua: if IsShiftKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil then CastSpellByName("Massenbannung") if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: Use:Trinket 1
Ability.Lua: local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13) if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil and UnitCastingInfo("player") == nil and UnitAffectingCombat("player") and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then UseInventoryItem(13) return true end

Ability.Name: Use:Trinket 2
Ability.Lua: local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",14) if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil and UnitCastingInfo("player") == nil and UnitAffectingCombat("player") and UnitLevel("target") == -1 then UseInventoryItem(14) return true end

Ability.Name: Use:Trinket (SP)
Ability.Lua: local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13) if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and UnitBuffID("player", 75473) or UnitBuffID("player", 2825) or UnitBuffID("player", 32182) and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil and UnitCastingInfo("player") == nil then UseInventoryItem(13) return true end

Ability.Name: -- Offensive Spells --
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Use:Mouseover Skill
Ability.Lua: if UnitAffectingCombat("player") and IsMouseButtonDown() then RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end

Ability.Name: Dis:Flash Heal

Ability.Name: Dis:Renew
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID(PQR_CustomTarget, 48068,"PLAYER") == nil and (PQR_CustomTargetHP < 95 or UnitThreatSituation(PQR_CustomTarget) == 3) then return true end

Ability.Name: Dis:Prayer of Mending
Ability.Lua: if lowhpmembers >= 2 and UnitBuffID(PQR_CustomTarget, 48113,"PLAYER") == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Dis:Prayer of Healing
Ability.Lua: if lowhpmembers >= 3 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(48072) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: Dis:Cure Disease
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { } local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 0, members, 1 do if i==0 then mem = "player" else mem = group..tostring(i) end if UnitInRange(mem) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(mem) == nil then local candispel = 1 for k,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(mem,v) then candispel = nil end end local j = 1 local debuff,_,_,count,bufftype,dur = UnitDebuff(mem, j) while debuff do if bufftype == "Disease" and dur > 1 and candispel then CastSpellByID(528,mem) return true end j = j + 1; debuff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(mem, j) end end end

Ability.Name: Dis:Power Word: Shield
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID(PQR_CustomTarget,6788) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Dis:Power Word: Shield (Ally)
Ability.Lua:
local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers()
if UnitDebuffID("player", 6788) == nil then CastSpellByID(48066, "player") end
if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) if UnitDebuffID(member, 6788) == nil and UnitInRange(member) and UnitIsFriend("player", member) and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) == nil and UnitHasVehicleUI(member) == false then CastSpellByID(48066, member) end end

Ability.Name: Dis:Dispel Magic
Ability.Lua:
if DoNotDispell then return false end if 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") < 25 then return false end local i = 1 local baddispel = nil local goodtodispel = nil
local dontdispel = { 47843, 65812, 68154, 68155, 68156, 70867} for _,v in ipairs(dontdispel) do if UnitDebuffID(PQR_CustomTarget,v) then baddispel = 1 end end
local i = 1 local buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(PQR_CustomTarget, i) while buff do if bufftype == "Magic" and duration > 6 and count ~= 1 and not baddispel and UnitIsFriend("player",PQR_CustomTarget) then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(PQR_CustomTarget, i) end

Ability.Name: Dis:Mass Dispel
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil then CastSpellByName("Mass Dispel") if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: Holy:Cure Disease

if DoNotDispell then return false end if 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") < 50 then return false end local i = 1 local baddispel = nil local goodtodispel = nil

local i = 1 local buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(PQR_CustomTarget, i) while buff do if bufftype == "Disease" and duration > 6 and count ~= 1 and not baddispel and UnitIsFriend("player",PQR_CustomTarget) then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(PQR_CustomTarget, i) end

Ability.Name: Shadow:-- Hotkeys --
Ability.Lua:
if not leftkeydown then leftkeydown = 0 end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - leftkeydown > 1 then leftkeydown = GetTime()
if StopRota then

else

end end

Cleave = false print("Mind Sear disabled!")
else
Cleave = true print("Mind Sear enabled!")
end end
